info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 25 at 6:08PM MST until July 25 at 7:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 608 PM MST, Flooding in Golden Valley caused some roads to be impassable in Golden Valley. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain fell earlier but heavy rainfall has ended. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Mohave County Roads reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Golden Valley. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
